body_html:
OK. Depthwise convolution is actually a different type of conv. You can find "depthwise_conv2d_native".

For this, it might be better to just have two separate convs like what inception did to avoid all the slicing operations.

For this, it might be better to just have two separate convs like what inception did to avoid all the slicing operations.
body:
OK. Depthwise convolution is actually a different type of conv. You can find "depthwise_conv2d_native".

For this, it might be better to just have two separate convs like what inception did to avoid all the slicing operations.
